title: Stop toying with my heart.
body: Stop toying with my heart, riot please these small updates keep giving me hope for urf, stop please just release it. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
It's like a really good book, where there's a massive cliffhanger and someone is about to die or change the world, then you turn the next page and find a huge "THE END" .

You've already angered us once Rito with the removal of Dominion. Never have I seen so many down votes on a Rito post before.

Now you're playing with our hearts. 
Don't say "While we’re pretty sure you aren’t going to believe us anyway, we’re telling you right now that URF will not return on the first of April.", right before April fools. 

Of course we don't believe you.
I just miss when they actually released patch updates to let us know what they are actually doing with the updates.

I had read somewhere that U.R.F. is being enabled eventually, but it is not going to be up for April Fools. To make up for it, RIOT are going to release U.R.F. twice this year.

I am not sure how accurate this information might be, and I do not know any dates on releases of U.R.F.

> We’re announcing it now is because two years in a row, we delivered the Ultra Rapid Fire game mode in increasingly absurd ways. While we’re pretty sure you aren’t going to believe us anyway, we’re telling you right now that URF will not return on the first of April.

If you want to read more: [Click Here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue)

GUYS GUYS GUYS OMG
URF IS UP but you have to activate it riot hasn't revealed it yet.
This vid will show you how to activate it https:// www.youtube.com /watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ (no spaces)
WOOOOOOOO
